modName: Kozakowy's Black Corset Dress UNP CBBE
summary: This is my second mod. A black vampire-related outfit for everyday use :) but it is rather not suitable for riding or battle. Have fun with it.
descriptionHtml:
*** UPDATE! ***

1.3-beta Jacket added :)
1.2-beta LONG (FISHTAIL) AND SHORT (KNEE-LENGTH) VERSIONS AVAILABLE WITH BOOTS AND GLOVES ADDED :) MINOR CLIPPIN MAY OCCUR IN CBBE VER.
1.1-beta FOR THOSE OF YOU WHO USE BOTH CBBE AND UNP  - A KNEE-LENGTH OUTFIT ADDED
1.0-beta LONG VERSION UNP ONLY

THIS MOD IS STILL A BETA - FULL VERSION COMING SOON

If you like it please ENDORSE :)

1. Description:

This is my second mod. A black vampire-related outfit for everyday use :) but it is rather not suitable for riding or battle. Have fun with it. UNP
only.

2. Known issues:

- there's no weightslider compatibility so please turn the weight down to zero to avoid hand and feet seams
- the weights on the fishtail skirt are not fine-tuned yet so in some poses it may act weird
- short skirts are legged only, I want to smoothen the skirt weights in the full version - please let me know what you think of it
- female only
- minor clipping problems may occur
- fishtail version includes invisible boots - use only with similar ones otherwise you'll get feet clipping through the skirt

3. How to get it in game:

- type in console "help blackcorset", you will get all needed IDs.
- type in console "player.additem XXX Y". XXX means necessary ID, Y means count of items you want.

4. Installation:

- I suggest using MO or NMM you can also extract the package manually.


5. Uninstallation:

- again I suggest using MO or NMM or you can remove the .esp file and mod's folders


6. Terms of use:

- You are not allowed to reupload this mod to other sites without permission. 
- You have to ask me first if you want to use any part of this mod in your own such as follower mod, mashup mod, etc.
- You have to ask me first if you want to convert the outfit to other bodies.
- You have to ask me first if you want to recolor/retexture the outfit.
- You are not allowed to publicily share any your modification of this mod, private sharing is allowed.
- You are not allowed to convert this outfit to other games.

If you have any questions please ask.


Credits:

- all parts of the armor are modelled from the scratch by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/11770218/?]kozakowy[/url]
- big thanks  to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3140055/?]zerofrost[/url] I've learned much looking at his armors
- thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6565535/?]ShinglesCat [/url]I got much inspired to make this mod by her and also figured out how to prepare a proper description[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3140055/?]
[/url]- the gloves and armlets seen on the shots are not part of the mod - they're made by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60195/]nsk13
[/url]- the jewlery is not part of the mod and it's made by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81073]apachii[/url]
author: kozakowy
